DOC.brief_summary: This study is assessing whether there is a decrease in surgical glove punctures using blunt tipped needles compared with sharp needles for suturing during Cesarean Delivery.
DOC.brief_title: Glove Perforation When Using Blunt Verses Sharp Needles in Cesarean Delivery
DOC.criteria: Patients at least 18 years of age undergoing Cesarean Delivery Patient less than 18 years of age. Patient not undergoing Cesarean Delivery.
